attributes.contentHtml:
Toxic And Unprofessional :- Yes i Might Be Toxic But Only To People Who Make Me Really Mad Like Vanquish He Just Came And Took all Of Our Hard Work Me And The Whole Staff Team Put Into Affinity But Like Normal Chatting And Stuff Like That I'm Not Toxic At All, Yes I Might Be Unprofessional Sometimes But Mostly is In Staff Chat But I'm Not Really Unprofessional Like I Do my Job Correctly and Can Take Care Of It etc. + You Dont Have Any Proof To Say That Im Unprofessional + I Have proof That Can Prove My msg Above ^^^^

I Asked Some Of My Friends And host Owners That I Work In "Am I Toxic And Unprofessional"

  1. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814892772737286164/unknown.png
  2. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814893754740637740/unknown.png
  3. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814894067682246656/unknown.png
  4. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814894770325291018/unknown.png
  5. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814894985623240764/unknown.png
  6. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814895389244915762/unknown.png
  7. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814895687551418488/unknown.png
  8. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814895940803493938/unknown.png
  9. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814896254874157127/unknown.png
  10. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814896659850723378/unknown.png
  11. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/719056972904661094/814897940287586324/unknown.png

10 Years Old And Underage :- I Am Not 10 Years Old I am 14 And Not Underage And You Dont Have Any Proof To Say That Im 10 Years Old And Underage

Demotes People For No Reason :- Yes I Might Have Demoted Atomic Boy And TME ( TheMinecraftExplorer ) For No Reason At 2 Hosts But I Didnt Demote Anyone Else In Any Other Host For No Reason

Begs For Admin Perms And Set Him Self up As Executive :- I Dont Beg For Admin perms On Any Host + You Dont Have Any Proof To Say So And I Gave My Self Executive Only In One Host ( NightNodes ) But I Had the Perms To Do So And U Dont Have Any Proof To Say So

Doesnt Know None About Hosting And Dosent Know How To Use Staff Panel :- I Have Been In The Hosting Industry For Long Enough Know And Have Enough knowledge And Experience And You Dont Have Any Proof To Say So , I Am Usually Not Given Staff Panel Access So I Dont Get The Chance To Get Enough Knowledge And Experience Of it.

Deleted Someone's Server On Accident And Argues A lot In Tickets :- I Never Argued In Tickets At All and u Dont Have Proof To Say So , I Didnt Even have Staff Panel Access Probably And I Never Deleted Someone's Server And U Dont have Proof To Say So

Good Friends With Oreo And RusJS So They Give Him Staff In All Hosts Always :- Yes I Am Good Friends With Oreo And RusJS But They Dont Give Me Staff In All Hosts Because Im Friends With Them they Give me Staff Because they Know Im Good In My Job And know How To Take Care Of It Nicely.

He Was Staff In Many Failure Hosts :- I Was Staff In ( Raided , Affinity ) The Only Two Hosts That i Was Staff In And Failed So It Doesnt Count As Many , i Still Dont Know Why Raided Failed But It Wasn't Because Of Me And Affinity Doesnt Count As Failed Because The Ownership Just got Transferred And It Became Rebranded.

Him Swearing And Saying Nigga To people :- Yes I Said Ni**a To Vanquish But Its Was For A Reason ( As I Said In the First Section " Toxic And Unprofessional" ) Its Because He Came And Just Took All Our Hard Work That me And The Staff Team Put Into Affinity And Saying Ni*a To One Person Doesnt Count As "People" And Also Doesnt Mean That Im Toxic

Him Threatening My Friends Vanquish :- If u Think that Telling Someone I Am Going To Put His Host In Winterhoax Means I Am Threatening Him Then U Are So Fucking Dumb.

He Also Said He Is Going To Nuke Vanquish Host :- If You Think That If I Say To Someone Ur Going To Get Good News Soon Means Going To Nuke Them Then Ur Fucking Stupid + I Was Joking

Rn He Is Also Trying To Get Other Hosts To Merge With Nightnodes :- Idk How Is This Even Wrong But I Wasnt Trying To Get Them Merged i Was Helping Them To Merge Its Not Me That Took The Decision + You Dont Have Proof To Say So

He Also Once Gave Someone His Paypal To Pay Him For Resources :- I Dont Even Have A Paypal And I Wouldnt Do Such A Thing I Would Be Stupid If i Do So + You Dont have Proof To Say So.

Him Giving Away His Personal Info So People Seem Sad About Him :- You Are So Fuckin Stupid Why Would I Give Someone My Personal Info I Would Be Stupid If I Do So U Dont Make Fucking Sense + You Dont Have Proof To Say So

This Is All I Hope This Clears Everything This Stupid Shit Said And , Have A Great Rest Of Ur Day.
PxndaForLife Hmm you seem desperate so idc those screens prove nothing you just asked your 5 friends are you toxic or not lmfao
